revisions.*:
[[File:Icon DaSII Menu Head Armor.png|right]]
{{For|the disambiguation of the same name|Armor}}
'''Armor''' is a type of equipment in ''[[Dark Souls II]]''.

==Categories of Armor==
Armor sets are divided into three categories based on their total weight:
*[[Light Armor Sets (Dark Souls II)|Light Armor Sets]] (0 - 14.9)
*[[Medium Armor Sets (Dark Souls II)|Medium Armor Sets]] (15 - 29.9)
*[[Heavy Armor Sets (Dark Souls II)|Heavy Armor Sets]] (30+)

Each armor set is divided into four pieces based on the body part protected:
*[[:Category:Dark Souls II: Head Armor|Head Armor]]
*[[:Category:Dark Souls II: Chest Armor|Chest Armor]]
*[[:Category:Dark Souls II: Hands Armor|Hands Armor]]
*[[:Category:Dark Souls II: Legs Armor|Legs Armor]]
Most armor sets are complete, but there are some unique pieces of armor that are not part of a set, and other sets that do not have all four pieces.
